description: Czech boys are sometimes incredibly careless. This guy got a customer loan approved, went to a bank, withdrew 20 000 Crowns, and after all that trouble he lost it on the way home! He put the money in an envelope and apparently it slipped out of his pocket. I´m serious. He had a little daughter with his girlfriend and their plan was to furnish a room for her. That´s what the money was for. So there he was, sitting in front of me, sad and desperate. Obviously, his girlfriend would probably leave him if she knew. That´s why he tried to hide it from her and use my money to pay for the furniture. I already had one "meeting" today but the boy was so good looking I was willing to give him all the money I had left. I couldn´t ruin their Christmas, could I?
title: Debt Dandy 171
